item.description:
We will be meeting to hear this Author instead of Crema Cafe. Then may be afterwards we will stop for tea, coffee, drinks and pastries somewhere in Chinatown or over at Au Bon Pain at Tufts Medical Center to get together and chat. Hope you can join us. Details below.

If you can't make the Author talk call me at 781-354-4802 to fnd out where we are later.

Meet the Author: Anthony Lee, Ph.D. - A Shoemaker's Story
Sat., April 25, 2009 1PM@ BCNC.
In 1870, seventy-five Chinese immigrants stepped off a train in the New England factory town of North Adams, MA, imported as strikebreakers by the local shoe manufacturer. Co-sponsored by the Chinese Historical Society of New England.

For more info, contact Giles Li at 617-635-5129 x1070.

group.name: The Boston Mandarin Chinese Language Meetup Group

item.name: Meet the Author: Anthony Lee, Ph.D. - A Shoemaker's Story
